mapper.update: UPDATE tb_other_expense SET oe_store_name=#{oeStoreName}, oe_vat_type=#{oeVatType}, oe_total=#{oeTotal}, oe_supply_value=#{oeTotal}/1.1, oe_tax=oe_total-oe_supply_value, at_debit_code=#{atDebitCode}, at_credit_code= #{atCreditCode}, oe_etc= #{oeEtc}, oe_date= #{oeDate}, oe_reg_date=NOW() WHERE oe_code=#{oeCode};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_other_expense (oe_code, store_info_code, oe_store_name, oe_vat_type, oe_total, oe_supply_value, oe_tax, at_debit_code, at_credit_code, oe_etc, oe_date, oe_reg_date) VALUES (sf_new_otherexpense_code(), #{storeInfoCode}, #{oeStoreName}, #{oeVatType}, #{oeTotal}, #{oeTotal}/1.1, oe_total-oe_supply_value, #{atDebitCode}, #{atCreditCode}, #{oeEtc}, #{oeDate}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT oe.oe_code ,si.store_info_code ,si.store_info_name ,oe.oe_store_name ,oe.oe_vat_type ,oe.oe_total ,oe.at_debit_code ,oe.at_credit_code ,oe.oe_date ,oe.oe_etc FROM tb_other_expense AS oe LEFT JOIN tb_store_info AS si ON oe.store_info_code = si.store_info_code WHERE oe.oe_code = #{oeCode};
